name: Sephardic Music
description: Encompasses the various musical traditions of Sephardi Jews.

children.name: Baqashot
children.description: Collection of prayers, songs, supplications, and poems traditionally sung by Sephardic Jewish communities on Saturdays mornings.

children.name: Ladino Folksong
children.description: Ladino-language Traditional Folk Music tunes that were written and preserved by Sephardic Jews.

children.name: Maftirim
children.description: Paraliturgical songs of Sephardi Jews who lived in Ottoman Empire.
